name: Sh0rk
description:
-Sent to the depths of an underground storage facility, you are tasked to exterminate the failed test subjects, genetically and cybernetically enchanched sharks. 

-Fight to the death using your high powered heated harpoon gun in this action packed arena shooter! Can you survive this jaw filled onslaught?

Made as part of a uni games jam following a brief made up of our future aspirations...dont look too hard into it, we promise theres an explanation to our creative decisions.

-Controls-

  • WASD - Movement
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left click - Fire
  • Right click - Retrack harpoon

-Team members-

  • Joel - Concept, 3D & Ue5 art
  • Szymon - Technical designer/Ue5 & music
  • Josh - Ue5 coding & UI
  • Della - Concept and Illustration
  • Jordan - 3D
